name: Dangerous Days
description:
When humanity is no longer distinguishable what does it mean to be human.

What memories are not dreams?
Are you living in the real world?

Presenting :

A SciFi Noire Investigation Game about Humans and Non Humans!

Developed for AdvJam2016

CHECK OUT THE GAMEJOLT PAGE HERE

Controls:

Right mouse : Interact / Grab (Inspect)

Mouse Wheel : Move Items Farther or Closer

WASD : Move

C : Crouch

ESC / END : Pause Game

Lead Developer : Lamms (ENP) http://www.indiedb.com/members/enp

Art Direction / 3D Modeling : Nate "BlastoGypsy" Eeten http://blastogypsy.tumblr.com/

Sound Design : Tingle https://soundcloud.com/jense-jorgenson

Voice Acting (Narrator) : Jim2Dimensional http://www.youtube.com/user/Jim2Dimensional

Special Thanks to the Gamejolt Community and Fellow Developers to an Awesome Game Jam!

Initial Build to Arrive May 19th - May 20th

Much more to come soon.
